title: MANGA DE WAKARU REGRESSION ANALYSIS
synopsis:
Like a lot of people, Miu has had trouble learning regression analysis. But with new motivation—in the form of a handsome but shy customer—and the help of her brilliant café coworker Risa, she’s determined to master it.

Follow along with Miu and Risa in The Manga Guide to Regression Analysis as they calculate the effect of temperature on iced tea orders, predict bakery revenues, and work out the probability of cake sales with simple, multiple, and logistic regression analysis. You’ll get a refresher in basic concepts like matrix equations, inverse functions, logarithms, and differentiation before diving into the hard stuff. Learn how to:
–Calculate the regression equation
–Check the accuracy of your equation with the correlation coefficient
–Perform hypothesis tests and analysis of variance, and calculate confidence intervals
–Make predictions using odds ratios and prediction intervals
–Verify the validity of your analysis with diagnostic checks
–Perform chi-squared tests and F-tests to check the goodness of fit
(Google Books)

title: Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 The Manga
synopsis:
After answering the call for new Time Patrollers in Toki Toki City, the Future Warrior noticed a strange rift appear in the city. Upon investigation, he was sucked inside to find himself at the climax of the Battle of Namek. He then noticed Goku, who wondered who he was, landing next to him while Cooler and Frieza prepared to destroy them with a Death Ball. Goku turns back into a Super Saiyan and tells the Warrior to escape while he fights. The original Future Warrior then appears to help and notices and tells the new Warrior to give it his all. The three then defeat Cooler and Frieza with a Multiple Kamehameha, restoring the timeline.

In Toki Toki City, time rifts continued to multiply and eventually consumed the city, forcing Chronoa to rebuild it as Conton City. The Future Warrior is shown looking at his predecessors holographic image. He is then shown on a mission with other Time Patrollers battling a Great Ape, and reveals he can become a Super Saiyan 3.

title: Shousetsu Dororo
synopsis:
Japan, 1449, Jukai, a former physician for the imperial court lives quietly on the mountain of Kurama, hiding from the violence and prejudice in the capital city of Kyoto. While gathering herbs in the forest, he is caught in a sudden storm that drivees him to the Takano river, where he discovers an infant floating in a washbasin, caught in the reeds. This baby boy, Hyakkimaru, has no eyes, ears or limbs - but he is alive. It will take all of Jukai's medical knowledge to keep him that way.

As Hyakkimaru grows, he develops strange abilities of perception and sensation that allow him to communicate and interract with the world without ordinary human senses. He discovers that the loss of his limbs and appendages was no accident or birth defect, and that there is a way to get them back. He must travel through war-torn Japan to discover the mystery of his birth and dismemberment - and to make himself whole again.

Armed with her memories and her new cunning nature, she swears to delete them from her life, one by one. But will Antonia succeed, or will her dismal past repeat itself?

Tanaka Ichirou's life is shaping up to be pretty horrible. Despite his hard work, he's not very good at his company job. In exchange for keeping his job, he is coerced into marrying an unwilling girl. The girl was impregnated by her lover, a man who was already engaged, and the company wanted to avoid a scandal. Now everyone abuses Tanaka at work, and he goes home to take out his frustration on his unhappy wife. To top it all off, some people are planning to put an end to the whole situation by having him killed.

It is this last problem that brings him to the attention of a highly skilled ninja hitman, Shadow. Shadow is fleeing his criminal organization in search of a peaceful, normal, happy life. When he witnesses Tanaka's final moments, he decides to take the unfortunate man's life as his own. Will Shadow be able to find some kind of happiness in Tanaka's life, and will he be able to avoid his own past?

While walking, she is called out to by Karin Ishiwaka, a hairdresser at a nearby salon. Insisting that she cut Shion's hair, Ishiwaka drags her into her shop.
